title: Nano Keyboard Lite
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
description: This free version comes with no in-app advertising; never have, never will. Like Nano Keyboard? Please help support us by purchasing the paid version, which will soon come with extra features!WE'RE DOING THINGS A LITTLE DIFFERENTLY...This is the smallest keyboard on Google Play, and it has the biggest buttons! Each letter can be accessed with a swipe, and your most likely next letters can be tapped. Commonly, soft keyboards come with built in dictionaries to aid the text prediction process, from aardvark to zaardvark. Nano Keyboard differentiates itself by offering letter-by-letter suggestions that are generated from your typing vocabulary; not somebody else's. The more you use Nano Keyboard, the better these suggestions get!WHAT'S IT LIKE?It's a fun, simple, totally novel typing solution that you can impress your friends with. It's also the perfect tool to get the most out of your screen space, especially useful for the latest Android smart watches and Android Wear!DOES IT SPEAK MY LANGUAGE?So far, we're working in the beta version which is available only in English (EN-US). However, we're very excited to release new language support options very soon, plus a ton of other features.A LITTLE ABOUT YOUR PRIVACY.The words you type using Nano Keyboard are stored internally on your device to allow our letter-by-letter suggestion mechanism to work. This function is deactivated whenever you're typing in password protected fields and is completely private to this application only. Once you uninstall the application, all of this data is erased with it. We will never, ever, ever do anything with this information. It's all yours.
descriptionHTML:
This free version comes with no in-app advertising; never have, never will. Like Nano Keyboard? Please help support us by purchasing the paid version, which will soon come with extra features!

WE'RE DOING THINGS A LITTLE DIFFERENTLY...
This is the smallest keyboard on Google Play, and it has the biggest buttons! Each letter can be accessed with a swipe, and your most likely next letters can be tapped.
Commonly, soft keyboards come with built in dictionaries to aid the text prediction process, from aardvark to zaardvark. Nano Keyboard differentiates itself by offering letter-by-letter suggestions that are generated from your typing vocabulary; not somebody else's. The more you use Nano Keyboard, the better these suggestions get!

WHAT'S IT LIKE?
It's a fun, simple, totally novel typing solution that you can impress your friends with. It's also the perfect tool to get the most out of your screen space, especially useful for the latest Android smart watches and Android Wear!


DOES IT SPEAK MY LANGUAGE?
So far, we're working in the beta version which is available only in English (EN-US). However, we're very excited to release new language support options very soon, plus a ton of other features.


A LITTLE ABOUT YOUR PRIVACY.
The words you type using Nano Keyboard are stored internally on your device to allow our letter-by-letter suggestion mechanism to work. This function is deactivated whenever you're typing in password protected fields and is completely private to this application only. Once you uninstall the application, all of this data is erased with it. We will never, ever, ever do anything with this information. It's all yours.
comments: Letter alignment The letters are not aligned with the colors above them. I have a galaxy note 3. Please fix. Great concept. Also would suggest a letter indicator pops up to make sure ur on the letter u want.
Android Wear? You mention Android Wear devices in the app description. If you can tell me how to make this happen, I'll re-evaluate my rating.
How the????? Sorry how dose this work the app dose not show up as an app in my watch please help
recentChanges: • Withdrawn dynamic letters. It was just too soon!
• Finally, there's special characters! (Full version only!)
• It doesn't look like a child's play thing any more.
• Let our letters come to you!
